title: EP 52: Buffalo Soldiers
description: The Buffalo Soldiers- strong men from Black history. But a big part of their story has us conflicted about the role they played. In this episode, we hear their story, hear about a soldier who defected, and meet a man who ponders his own time in the military.
itunes:title: Buffalo Soldiers
itunes:subtitle: Sometimes the parts of our history we're proud of can also make us feel conflicted, when we know the whole story
author: hangout@thestoop.org (Hana Baba and Leila Day)
itunes:author: Hana Baba and Leila Day
itunes:summary: The Buffalo Soldiers- strong men from Black history. But a big part of their story has us conflicted about the role they played. In this episode, we hear their story, hear about a soldier who defected, and meet a man who ponders his own time in the military.
